backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining artworks, user profiles, purchases, and wallets with access control, artwork creation, profile management, and listing/query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of major frontend components, hooks, utilities, and views.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and global UI theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling routing, authentication, profile setup, artwork dialogs, and gallery/upload view selection.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Component showing a login-required message with navigation back to the gallery.
Form supporting artwork creation and editing with image optimization, progress tracking, field validation, and correct mutation selection.
frontend/src/components/AppHeaderNav.tsx: Header navigation component with a single button for navigating to the gallery.
frontend/src/components/ArtworkCard.tsx: Displays an artwork thumbnail card with image, title, price, and optional SOLD badge or watermark, triggering onClick when selected.
frontend/src/components/ArtworkDetailDia: Shows a detailed dialog for an artwork with large image, metadata, description, sold indicator, and optional edit button.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting the user to enter and save their name before continuing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on the userâ€™s identity and updates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, stored identities, authentication flow, and exposes identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries the backend to determine whether the current authenticated user is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating artworks and user profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoute.ts: Handles routing based on URL hash, supporting gallery and upload routes with optional edit parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useSoldDisplayPrefere: Stores and updates the user's preference for displaying sold artworks as a badge or watermark.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme OKLCH color variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/formatGBP.ts: Formats a bigint penny amount into a GBP currency string.
frontend/src/utils/imageOptimize.ts: Optimizes images by resizing and compressing them within size and dimension limits.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/src/views/GalleryView.tsx: Renders the gallery with sold filtering, display mode selection, and optional upload shortcut.
frontend/src/views/UploadView.tsx: Displays upload or edit artwork UI, loading artwork data when in edit mode.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Captures project metadata, implemented features, and pending feature requests.
